root.name: Virtua Tennis 4
root.description: OverviewVirtua Tennis 4 is a tennis game developed by Sega AM3 and published by Sega for the PC, PlayStation Vita, PlayStation 3, Wii, and Xbox 360 platforms.GameplayModesThe Game features the following game modes:World Tour: Compete to be an Ultimate Star while traveling across the world in a board game format, while completing Tournaments, Exhibition matches, Training Mini-Games, Charity Events and Promotions.Arcade: Work through an arcade style tournament attempting to get a high score.Exhibitiion: Play locally with AI or friends in a match.Practice: Play practice matches with AIParty: Play the mini games and comete for high scoresMotion Play: Use Kinect or PlayStation Move in an Exhibition match. (This option is not on the Wii as the whole game uses the WiiMote, or the PC)Online: Compete online using pre-made or custom characters on Xbox Live, PSN or on a custom made PC service. Level up your class to unlock new kit in the kit shop.RosterMenWomenRoger FedererCaroline WozniackiRafael NadalVenus WilliamsNovak DjokovicAna IvanovicJuan-Martin Del PotroMaria SharapovaGael MonfilsSvetlana KuznetsovaAndy MurrayAnna ChakvetadzeFernando GonzalezLaura RobsonAndy RoddickTommy HaasAndreas SeppiPhilipp KohlschreiberPC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPProcessor: 2GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or AMD equivalentMemory: 2GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800 / ATI Radeon™ X1800Recommended:OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPProcessor: 2GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or AMD equivalentMemory: 2GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 260 / ATI Radeon™ HD 4870
